solution_line_template: She had {initial_records} records, received {received_records} and bought {bought_records} for a total of {initial_records}+{received_records}+{bought_records} = <<{initial_records}+{received_records}+{bought_records}={total_records}>>{total_records} records

It takes {days_per_record} days to listen to 1 record and she has {total_records} records it will take her {days_per_record}*{total_records} = <<{days_per_record}*{total_records}={total_days}>>{total_days} days
